title: Bali Villa
description: I made this pms tracking web application from scratch. From bootstrap, CSS, Javscript, Node, Sequelize, Handlebars, SQL. I designed it for myself to help me track my moods based on my cycle. It is a project I continue to work on and have many future development ideas. It already has a few users/testers as well!

title: Grand Canyon Camping
description: This was a group project and the concept was my idea. It is a cattle tracking website that allows a user to input cattle information and it it tied to a ranch. I was responsible for overall vision, database development, Cattle input page, cattle search feature and the cattle models.

title: Monaco Yacht
description: I built an API for a social network web application where users can share thoughts, react to friends' thoughts and create a friend list.

title: Online Registries
description: I built an API for a social network web application where users can share thoughts, react to friends' thoughts and create a friend list.
